entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
